dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, so, um, you know that Jeff Bezos has been in the news again, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, so, um, you know that Jeff Bezos has been in the news again, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. Always something with the richest man on earth. What's the latest?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. Always something with the richest man on earth. What's the latest?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it turns out he just offloaded a *ton* of Amazon stock. Like, $1.4 billion after tax.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it turns out he just offloaded a ton of Amazon stock. Like, one point four billion dollars after tax.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The sales on August 1 and 2 followed $1.4 billion (after-tax) worth of Amazon stock he sold in the final three days of July.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, really? That's a huge chunk. When did this happen?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, really? That's a huge chunk. When did this happen?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it was, uh, August 1st and 2nd, but really wrapped up a few days after some late July sales too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it was, uh, August first and second, but really wrapped up a few days after some late July sales too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The sales on August 1 and 2 followed $1.4 billion (after-tax) worth of Amazon stock he sold in the final three days of July.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And I guess that knocked his net worth down a bit, even for him?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And I guess that knocked his net worth down a bit, even for him?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You got it. Down to, like, $110.1 billion according to Friday's opening share price. Still a lot of zeros, though!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You got it. Down to, like, one hundred ten point one billion according to Friday's opening share price. Still a lot of zeros, though!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As the richest man on earth, Bezos is now worth an estimated $110.1 billion, using Mondays closing share price for Amazon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. But, um, did Amazon say *why* he's selling? I mean, that's not just pocket change for a rainy day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. But, um, did Amazon say why he's selling? I mean, that's not just pocket change for a rainy day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's the thing! No official comment. But internally, the buzz is it's for a "competing company."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the thing! No official comment. But internally, the buzz is it's for a competing company.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A spokesman for Amazon has not commented on the purpose for Bezos last stock sales. The leading theory is that it is to fund Blue Origin, a space exploration company that Bezos founded in September 2000.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Wait, a *competing* company? Not Blue Origin, his space company?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, a competing company? Not Blue Origin, his space company?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Which is wild, because he actually denied in 2017 that he'd fund Blue Origin by selling Amazon shares. So this makes sense, in a weird way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Which is wild, because he actually denied in twenty seventeen that he'd fund Blue Origin by selling Amazon shares. So this makes sense, in a weird way.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bezos told journalists at a space exploration conference in 2017 that he was funding Blue Origin by selling some of his Amazon shares.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so if it's not Blue Origin, what other big venture does he have that needs a cool billion and change? That's, like, super intriguing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so if it's not Blue Origin, what other big venture does he have that needs a cool billion and change? That's, like, super intriguing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? But here's the kicker, B. The plot thickens.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? But here's the kicker, B. The plot thickens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: SEC filings from Monday show he actually *bought* over 530,000 Amazon shares when they were around $1900 a share.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: S E C filings from Monday show he actually bought over five hundred thirty thousand Amazon shares when they were around nineteen hundred dollars a share.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to documents filed on Monday afternoon with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the worlds richest man sold over 530,000 shares of Amazon when the stock price was around $1,900 a share.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He *bought* them? So he sold a bunch, then bought a bunch back? At a higher price, presumably?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He bought them? So he sold a bunch, then bought a bunch back? At a higher price, presumably?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, when he bought them, they were around $1900. On Monday, when the filing came out, the stock closed at $1765.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, when he bought them, they were around nineteen hundred dollars. On Monday, when the filing came out, the stock closed at seventeen sixty five dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to documents filed on Monday afternoon with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the worlds richest man sold over 530,000 shares of Amazon when the stock price was around $1,900 a share. On Monday, the stock closed at $1,765 a share.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlays] Oh, so he might have, like, bought high and then seen it drop shortly after. That's a curious move for someone so savvy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, so he might have, like, bought high and then seen it drop shortly after. That's a curious move for someone so savvy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it really makes you wonder what the full strategy is here, doesn't it? Very interesting moves from the world's richest man.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it really makes you wonder what the full strategy is here, doesn't it? Very interesting moves from the world's richest man.
